[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056501][color=#FFFFFF]Coronavirus Alert[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Recently a new human virus has started to make a very worldwide panic and people have been bulk buying everything because they have been informed to self isolate if you get any cold or flu symptoms. Omniscient has made an announcement about this panic and has warned all members to stay safe during this event.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056019][color=#FFFFFF]Quick Convo[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
A new feature has been added to the chat system. You will now be able to see in the bottom right of your screen a little chat box that you can click to talk to others in the chat system. The feature has a few bugs here and there but make sure you report them to Xerotic to get them fixed.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6055995][color=#FFFFFF]Catch-up (not Ketchup)[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Omniscient went inactive for a week and has informed us of why. He has stated he was having issues in real life and that everything now is back to normal. He is slowly replying to everyone's messages, but it will take time to get to them all.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6054914][color=#FFFFFF]COVID19 Pandemic Outbreak Map[/color][/url] - [mention=4293813]
A website has been made showing the COVID19 outbreak in a map view and it shows how many people have been confirmed to have the virus and how many people in the selected areas of the world.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056306][color=#FFFFFF]Made in China 2025: The Industrial Plan that China does not Want Anyone Talking About[/color][/url] - [mention=630163]
Since Trump has been in charge of the USA, China's trade deals with the US has been in a very heavy conflict. But China has a trick up there sleeve and plan to out rule the whole deal by 2025. 
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056510][color=#FFFFFF]What's your Hackúman Stats?[/color][/url] - [mention=3459543]
Hackúman has been once again updated with many new features but you can now view your own stats about the game. This means you can see how much damage you have done, how many kills you have and even more.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6056322][color=#FFFFFF]You're stuck home b/c of COVID19 What's the 1st thing you do? Answer using only GIFs[/color][/url] - [mention=3183372]
BV1 has made a very funny thread only allowing people to post GIF responses to the whole COVID19 outbreak, some of the images that people have posted just say more words than anyone could even write within the thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6055908][color=#FFFFFF]Name contest - $100[/color][/url] - [mention=1641546]
Hekaros is hosting a giveaway for his food delivery service company name. He cant think of a good one so he has let the users decide what it should be.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6055841][color=#FFFFFF]Giving away 10$ + FREE UNSATURATED METHOD![/color][/url] - [mention=4123196]
A user who goes by the name of The Broker is hosting a giveaway with a prize of ten dollars in bitcoin or PayPal and is also giving the winner a money-making method that they created.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 460

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/2.png[/img][/align] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/supporthfn.png[/img][/align] [align=center]We publish the HF News every week yet we have aged members who don't even know we exist! Wear any of the signatures listed below to support us and spread the word about HF News, HF Wiki, and Writers altogether. [color=white][spoiler=[b]Support Signatures[/b]] [color=white][b]-1-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/pdoOihY.png[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/pdoOihY.png[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-2-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/VTs6K6A.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/VTs6K6A.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-3-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/hkLhk6f.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/hkLhk6f.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-4-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/ceUBlwQ.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/ceUBlwQ.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-5-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/54dbXHH.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/pdoOihY.png[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-6-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/oowqdqM.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/oowqdqM.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [color=white][b]-7-[/b][/color] [url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/KssvPNL.gif[/img][/url] [code][align=center][url=https://bitly.com/1FnhESq][img]https://i.imgur.com/KssvPNL.gif[/img][/url][/align][/code] [/spoiler][/color][/align] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4336296][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/worldnews-simplicity.png[/img][/url][/align] [b][color=white]President Trump denies having any symptoms for Coronavirus[/color][/b] After the words of Donald Trump on the 10th of March, it was concluded that he has not yet been tested for the recently discovered Coronavirus disease that caused and is yet the reason for mass panic all over the world. Mr. Trump stated that he doesn't feel the need to get tested because it isn't supposed to be, quoting: "A big deal."[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.straitstimes.com/world/united-states/coronavirus-trump-says-he-has-no-symptoms-sees-no-need-to-be-tested] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Barcelona chemical plant explosion[/color][/b] The explosion managed to injure 13 and even kill one of the people in that area. However, to the residents of the neighbourhood in which the chemical plant was located - there were no health risks present at all. It is yet unknown, even to the officials as to what caused the explosion and what particular product was present in it.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-spain-blast-barcelona/one-dead-13-injured-in-explosion-at-barcelona-chemical-plant-idUSKBN20X21G] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Should we still be scared of COVID-19?[/color][/b] While the threat is still present, it might not be as serious as it may look. Indeed, a lot of people all over the world have been infected and the virus has already spread to almost every country - however, it is stated that the coronavirus disease presents health complications only to people that already have an ongoing disease or to people that are over 69 years of age. Regardless of the fact about it being deadly or not for you, you should always wear a mask, wash your hands frequently, avoid any contact with infected individuals and apply the general rules for hand hygiene, especially in high-risk areas. [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align] [b][color=white]Google Responding[/color][/b] A statement from the White House on Friday 13, Donald Trump said that Google now has 1,700 developers working on a project to provide the public with information on testing procedures. The main aim of the website is to provide reliable information after a questionnaire has been answered. “We are developing a tool to help triage individuals for Covid-19 testing. Verily is in the early stages of development, and planning to roll testing out in the Bay Area, with the hope of expanding more broadly over time,” Google tweeted. Among the aid offered by Google, Trump has also declared a National Emergency State.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/trump-says-google-is-helping-to-build-a-website-for-coronavirus-information/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Banned Journalism Coming to Minecraft[/color][/b] Minecraft, one of the most popular video games in many age groups, will soon have a virtual library for "banned" journalism. The project consists of a partnership between Reporters Without Borders, Blockworks, DDB Germany and MediaMonks. This will give users access “to articles banned in five countries that rank poorly on the nongovernmental organization’s World Press Freedom index: Egypt, Mexico, Russia, Saudi Arabia and Vietnam.” Work started on Thursday to launch the World Day Against Cyber Censorship, which is available in English and the original languages in which the papers were published. Reporters Without Borders' key purpose is to offer "unlimited rights" to citizens who live in a country where there is no democracy.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/03/13/tech/minecraft-uncensored-library-scli-intl/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Bill Gates Shifting His Focus[/color][/b] Bill Gates, co-founder of Microsoft, has stepped down from the board of directors. His abrupt leave from the board solely has to do with, “dedicate more time to his philanthropic priorities including global health, development, education, and his increasing engagement in tackling climate change.” He will remain a Technology Adviser to the CEO. Bill is not abandoning the company entirely but sacrifices certain duties to satisfy his other needs.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/bill-gates-steps-down-from-microsofts-board-of-directors/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Perseverance is Ready[/color][/b] NASA is ready to send its newly named rover, Perseverance, to mars in early 2021. Since the creation of the new rover, it has been referred to as “Mars 2020.” Students around the US sent in essays to NASA, through a contest they conducted, proposing what the rover's new name should be. Over 28,000 entries were received, and the results were reduced to 155 entries by the judges. The last nine names included: Endurance, Tenacity, Promise, Perseverance, Vision, Clarity, Ingenuity, Fortitude, and Courage. Perseverance was selected from a middle school student in Virginia who wrote, “We, not as a nation, but as humans, will not give up. We will always persevere into the future.” Perseverance will be joining curiosity on Mars and begin helping with exploration.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnet.com/news/nasas-mars-2020-rover-gets-an-official-name-perseverance/] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]TED Given Two Options [/color][/b] With events such as Google I / O, Facebook F8, and SXSW canceled due to the recent coronavirus outbreak, TED is heading in the same direction. People who attended the event were allowed to vote for a virtual conference or to postpone the event until July. Chris Anderson, the curator, said, “We are not canceling. We have two compelling options for how to outwit this virus.” If the event were to take place in July, it could still face potential problems and eventually come to a virtual conference. But with a virtual meeting, it comes with its own set of issues that may arise. Some of the biggest names in technology are present at TED, and not being able to connect in person over the few days of the conference might be a significant drawback for people attending. A final decision will be delivered next week.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-51751942] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Quantum Computing[/color][/b] Companies are still working to make the most efficient quantum computer. Honeywell has recently revealed that it has built the most powerful quantum computer to date and will be unveiling it in the next three months. Honeywell states that the machine will “achieve a Quantum Volume of 64Quantum Volume is a metric used in quantum computing that takes into account qubits (quantum bit, the basic unit of quantum information) and decoherence times (U(t) (unit operates as a function of time) in a system. IBM currently has a quantum computer with a quantum volume of 53 qubits, while Google has a quantum volume of 72 qubits, but it has not allowed anyone outside to run programs on it.[i][size=x-small][url=
https://techcrunch.com/2020/03/03/honeywell-says-it-will-soon-launch-the-worlds-most-powerful-quantum-computer] >>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-redsox.png[/img][/align] [b][color=white]Call of Duty: Warzone’s infinite revive exploit fixed[/color][/b] Call of Duty: Warzone has been out for under two days, and right now, we have our first exploit.A Reddit user by the name "Mightykonsti" incidentally found it with their duo's partner. Like other battle royale games, game play in Warzone's fight royale mode is continually contracting. In Warzone, this appears as a ring of gas that murders anybody outside the marker for quite some time. Unlike other forms of damage, gas damage passes through armor and eats at your HP at a rapid pace. Since the exploit has been reported, developers quickly worked together to release a patch and allow players to actually participate in matches. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.vg247.com/2020/03/12/call-of-duty-warzone-infinite-revive-glitch/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]A delay to the PS5 or Xbox Series X launch seems inevitable[/color][/b] No one anticipated Corona virus affected gamer's. We tend to stay inside for long stretches of hours, but now for the next generation of console there may be a slight issue with production and manufacturing of these devices. "GDC should have been an opportunity for the creative and business community to come together, to pitch, to shake hands, to form friendships, to strike deals. But it’s been postponed, unlikely to happen this year at all." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.vg247.com/2020/03/06/delay-ps5-xbox-series-x-launch-coronavirus/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Silent Hill soft reboot, Silent Hills revival in the works[/color][/b] Some good news in the wake of all the recent unfortunate news is that Silent Hill is currently in soft reboot with Sony’s Japan Studio co-developing it. Sony is said to be the one responsible for pitching the project, but it’s not clear if another team at Konami is developing it alongside SIE Japan. Some of the studios recently published work showcased that of the P.T. Demo (that was later cancelled). Rely on Horror says Sony is also behind this project, and it’s working to “patch up the relationship between Kojima Productions and Konami.” [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.vg247.com/2020/03/13/silent-hill-soft-reboot/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]A new Test Drive Unlimited game is in development[/color][/b] It's been a long time since the first Test Drive Unlimited set the tone for open-world racers, and almost ten since its desperate post-burnout paradise sequel. So it's about time that the franchise has returned to the limelight, and now there has been confirmed that it will be: KT Racing - Kylotonn, the studio behind the World Rally Championship arrangement, is currently in production. "They're based in Paris and Lyon. They're specialized in racing. They're doing off-road racing with WRC, and they're doing two-wheel racing with Isle of Man TT." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/a-new-test-drive-unlimited-game-is-in-development/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]AMD is changing the type of cooler it uses on next-gen graphics cards[/color][/b] In case you're not an aficionado of blower-style GPU coolers, AMD has uplifting news—it's disposing of them for its cutting edge Radeon graphics cards dependent on its RDNA 2 engineering. In its place, AMD will change to a hub fan cooling arrangement, similarly as Nvidia did when it propelled its GeForce RTX arrangement, and later its GeForce GTX cards dependent on Turing. "There will be no blower reference fans for gamers on next-gen. So you are correct," Herkelman wrote, with a winky-face for good measure." [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/amd-is-changing-the-type-of-cooler-it-uses-on-next-gen-graphics-cards/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Rust gets more security conscious with the CCTV update[/color][/b] CCTV cameras can be set up inside or around your base, after which you can see their feeds on your PC. You'll additionally need to appoint every camera a one of a kind identifier from the PC, letting you or any other person with the name get to the feed. Most likely best to stay quiet about it, at that point. Players have their hands on some encoded identifiers that will ideally prompt something intriguing, in the event that they can be split. You can begin hacking endlessly on your new PCs now. What more could you possibly want from the developers of Rust? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/rust-gets-more-security-conscious-with-the-cctv-update/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color] [align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align] [b][color=white]Re:Zero Season 2 Postpones Air Date to July[/color][/b] Re:Zero's second season is sadly delayed due to the COVID-19 virus. The virus has been the cause of many different cancelations and delays and it looks like we will have to put up with it for the time being. Re:Zero's second season was scheduled to air during the spring. At the current time, there is no date set on when the second season will start. For now, the official website, as well as Re:Zero's Twitter to stay tuned for any announcements. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5e6613036122f593021c26e6/Re-Zero-Season-2-Postpones-Air-Date-to-July]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Anime Trope For Glasses Made Real[/color][/b] A Japanese design firm by the name of EkōD Works has recently created a pair of glasses that will appeal to anime and manga lovers. In anime, there is a trope that is occasionally used. When viewing a character's profile (side view) there is a likely chance that part of the temple is removed, therefore revealing more of the character's eyes. That is not always the case, so some people might not understand what this means. To get a better understanding, please click this link [url=https://i.imgur.com/RJY2Vjm.png]here[/img]. In the picture provided in that link, you can see a female character with a portion of her glasses removed. This is to provide a clear look at that character's eyes as mentioned earlier. At the moment, only a prototype has been created and a [/url][url=https://twitter.com/ekoDWorks/status/1237337012367028225]Twitter[/url] thread was created showcasing the glasses. [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/anime-trope-for-glasses-made-real-1842260372]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]You Can Watch Crunchyroll Streams in 1080p For Free — It's Just Not Advertised[/color][/b] The majority of the people who watch anime, most likely use a streaming service to do so. That streaming service is more than likely Crunchyroll. Not everyone has a premium subscription for the service, though. Users are allowed to create free accounts if they do not wish to upgrade to a premium subscription. There are a few downsides to not having a premium membership. There are multiple reasons as to why someone would upgrade their account. One beneficial one is the removal of ads. Second, a guaranteed high-quality server for you to watch whatever anime you are watching. This will reduce buffer time and ensure that you have the greatest watching quality. One last example is that premium members can watch series a few days earlier than free members. Sounds great, right? Please note this is no way an advertisement to purchase a membership. There are good things about being a free member too! It was recently discovered that non-premium members can view certain anime in 720p and 1080p. It is as simple as clicking the "cog wheel" via the media player and changing your source. As simple and easy as that little trick is, not too many people have realized you can do this. On YouTube it's general an instinct to want a higher quality video. When your video on YouTube is buffering or looks low quality, you usually see if you can bump it to 720p or 1080p, right? This certainly makes sense. But why would this not be the first thought when it comes to Crunchyroll? Crunchyroll's premium service page lists that free members can only watch videos in 480p. Additionally, you would think that a service that requires you to upgrade will have some sort of quality benefit, where as YouTube is just a free video platforming website. Key term "free." This is very misleading and more than likely is a way to trick you into purchasing a membership. Writers of the anime news website, AnimeNewsNetwork, reached out to the support service of Crunchyroll to get an answer on why they market the page that way, but they refused to give any comments. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/interest/2020-03-10/you-can-watch-crunchyroll-streams-in-1080p-for-free-its-just-not-advertised/.157362]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Pokémon the Movie: Coco Releases Latest Trailer![/color][/b] In Japan on July 10, the twenty-third Pokémon movie, "Pokémon the Movie: Coco," will be released in theatres. Similar to the American film, "George of the Jungle," Coco will take place in a forest, where a young boy named Coco lives among Pokémon. You can compare both movies in many different ways. Both involve children who were raised in the jungle (forest for Coco) by the creatures that inhabit it and growing up in that environment and even thinking they are the species they grew up with. In the trailer, you can see Coco flying across trees using vines and eating berries. The mythical Pokémon Zarude raised Coco. This Pokémon is new to everyone and has never been seen before. They both live in Okoya Forest, which is off-limits to those without specific credentials as it is a safe-haven for Pokémon to live in. Long behold, we have one of everyone's favorite main character, Ash Ketchum (known as Satoshi in the Japanese version), being the adventurer he always is and decides to explore the forest. Soon after, Ash finds himself meeting Coco. Feel free to watch the trailer [url=https://youtu.be/AJ_7ZcklO9k]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5e54e7901c7d292b5e8e4eb2/Pokémon-the-Movie-Coco-Releases-Latest-Trailer!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Funimation Screens 1st 3 Episodes of Fruits Basket 2nd Season Anime in U.S. Theaters on March 30-31[/color][/b] If you enjoyed the 2019 edition of Fruits Baskets, then you should be excited to hear that a second season has been announced. Funimation is pleased to announce that Fruits Basket 2nd Season will be airing the first three episodes of the season in theatres across America. You can find a location near you by clicking the link [url=https://www.funimationfilms.com/movie/fruits-basket/]here[/url]! The showings will suffice for those who enjoy watching dubbed or subbed versions of anime. The viewing for the English dub will take place on March 30, whereas the subtitled version will take place a day after on March 31. For those who want to sit back and relax at home to watch it, the anime will be airing on April 6. If you felt the first season had a cliffhanger ended, do not fear as the second season will cover the of the manga. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-03-06/funimation-screens-1st-3-episodes-of-fruits-basket-2nd-season-anime-in-u.s-theaters-on-march-30-31/.157242]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [b][color=white]Azur Lane Anime's Delayed 11th Episode Previewed in Video[/color][/b] The mobile application game, Azur Lane, recently put out a video for the eleventh episode of the on-going anime that was delayed back from December of 2019 — originally supposed to air on December 19 and respectfully after on the twenty-sixth, the eleventh and twelfth episode was postponed due to the producers wanting to "improve the quality of the anime." Many fans were furious, as this anime was very popular at the time. The Azur Lane mobile fanbase is quite vast, and this delay has lowered the ratings slightly as a result. Having to wait three months for the last two episodes of a series for a minimal reason is quite silly, but it might just be more serious going on behind the scenes. At the beginning of January, individual TV stations in Japan have rebroadcasted the anime from the beginning so that viewers can refresh their memory on what happened. Viewers should expect the eleventh episode to air on March 13 and the twelfth to air on March 20. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-03-07/azur-lane-anime-delayed-11th-episode-previewed-in-video/.157251]>>Source[/url][/size][/i] [color=transparent] [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 460
